concept.title: 39.301 ICT accessibility standards for task orders or delivery orders.

conbody.p: When issuing a task order or delivery order under an indefinite-quantity contract, the requiring activity and ordering activity must ensure compliance with the ICT accessibility standards. For a noncompliant ICT item, the requiring activity must document an exception (see 39.104-5) or exemption (see 39.104-5).
